other_title: 美少女遊撃隊バトルスキッパー (Japanese)
plot: Three newcomers join the Etiquette club rather than the popular Debutante Club and soon discover its members are part of a secret task force called Exters. Fan service is a predominated feature in the transformation sequence.
ending_theme: "Kanashii Tenshi ni Nacchau ne" by Kikuko Inoue and Shiho Niiyama (ep 3)
